full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Kootenay Bunkhouse Demolition - Kootenay National Park

#### Reference Number
* PW-22-01008065

#### Solicitation Number
* 5P468-22-0123/A

#### Tender Closing Date
* October 13, 2022, 4:00 pm (MST)

#### Description
Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to demolish the vacant Kootenay bunkhouse in Kootenay National Park. The successful bidder will be responsible for removing hazardous materials and restoring the site to its original natural condition.

#### Requirements
* Estimated project value: $100,001 to $250,000 (inclusive of taxes)
* Demolition and removal of hazardous materials
* Restoration of the site to its original natural condition
* Compliance with National Parks Regulations and all applicable laws, rules, and regulations

#### Submission Guidelines
* Submissions must be made through the Government of Canada's electronic tendering service
* Bidders must submit their proposals in the official language of their choice (English or French)
* All submissions must be accompanied by the required attachments and documents
* Late submissions will not be accepted

#### Site Visit
* An optional site visit will be held on October 4, 2022, at 2:00 pm (MDT) at the Radium Visitors Centre
* Interested bidders are encouraged to attend and submit their names to the Contracting Authority in advance

#### Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: Aarondeep Maan (aarondeep.maan@pc.gc.ca)
* Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC J8X 0B3
* Phone: 403-585-7139
* Fax: 1-855-983-1808

#### Attachments
The following documents are available for download from the Government of Canada's electronic tendering service:

* Invitation to Tender (ITT)
* Addendum 01
* Addendum 02
* Drawing and Specifications (DSP)

#### Language of Service
Service will be provided in either English or French, depending on the bidder's preference.

#### Notice
Parks Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure that their submission is complete and accurate. 

### Submission Details

* Number of Queries: 2 Amendment
* Closure Date: 2022-10-13T16:00:00
* Estimated Contract Start and
